title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 22.10 - Effective dates
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 22.10 - Effective dates

State Regulations

The provisions of sections 22.6 and
22.7
of this Part shall be effective on December 1, 1981; the provisions of sections 22.4 and
22.5
of this Part shall be effective on April 1, 1982; the provisions of section
22.8
of this Part, which require the annual reporting of certain occupational exposures not later than September 1st of each year, shall be effective September 1, 1982 for the initial reporting period January 1, 1982 through June 30, 1982; and the provisions of sections
22.1, 22.2 and
22.3
of this Part shall be effective on October 1, 1982. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
22.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
